Blacksmith of Flame Vulcan:
Inextinguishable flame?
How do you know about him? Yes, of course, with Mr. Vulcan has Neugosimoe flames. Well... If necessary, he will give it to you. Do not think that you will get the latest.
But getting it is not so simple. For starters listen to me...
